communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Settlement documents for the Craig Jones Invitational 2, held at the Thomas & Mack Center on August 30–31, 2025
- Final ticket sales broken out by seating level (platinum, gold, silver, etc)
- Final event cost as paid by the licensee
- Any contract amendments attached to the original booking contract

This is the event: https://www.flograppling.com/articles/14514559-b-team-wins-1m-prize-defeats-new-wave-at-cji-2-in-razor-thin-decision

If the requested documents have not yet been finalized, please hold this request until they are ready, or let me know when to re-file.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Amico

title: Request for Records – Christan Micah Moore

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all available records pertaining to the arrest of Christan Micah Moore (DOB: 11/28/2002), who was arrested on May 20, 2025 by Main Jail, Broward County, Florida. Specifically, I am seeking:

All body-worn camera footage, dash camera recordings, and surveillance video related to this arrest.

Copies of all 911 call recordings, CAD reports, and dispatch logs connected to this incident.

The arrest report, incident reports, and any probable cause affidavits.

A complete list of charges filed, including statutes cited, court case numbers, and associated documents.

Booking information, including intake notes, property/evidence logs, and holding records.

The arrest information reflects charges of multiple counts of Premeditated Murder (First Degree) under Statute 782.04-1a1, including references to attempted murder in the first degree.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Baxter Price

title: FOIA Request – Records Concerning the Arrest of Tarique Smith on August 21, 2025

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: FOIA Request – Records Concerning the Arrest of Tarique Smith on August 21, 2025
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all available records related to the arrest of Tarique Smith (DOB: 11/06/1997), which occurred on August 21, 2025, in Broward County, Florida. Specifically, I am seeking access to:

911 call recordings, dispatch logs, and CAD reports connected to this incident.

Body-worn camera (BWC) footage, dash camera video, and in-car recordings generated by responding deputies.

Incident reports, arrest affidavits, and use-of-force reports related to this case.

For reference, the charges listed at booking included:

DUI Causing Death to Any Human (Statute: 316.193-3c3a)

DUI Causing Death to Any Human (Statute: 316.193-3c3a)

Vehicular Homicide – Person or Viable Fetus (Statute: 782.071-1a)

Driving with No Valid DL Causing Death/Serious Injury (Statute: 322.34-6a)

DUI & Serious Bodily Injury to Another (Statute: 316.193-3c2)

DUI with Damage to Property or Person of Another (Statute: 316.193-3c1)

DUI with Damage to Property or Person of Another (Statute: 316.193-3c1)

DUI with Damage to Property or Person of Another (Statute: 316.193-3c1)

Reckless Driving – Damage to Person or Property (Statute: 316.192-3c1)

Reckless Driving – Damage to Person or Property (Statute: 316.192-3c1)

Reckless Driving – Damage to Person or Property (Statute: 316.192-3c1)

Reckless Driving – Damage to Person or Property (Statute: 316.192-3c1)

These details are provided to assist your office in identifying the requested materials.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Baxter Price

title: FOIA Request – Records Relating to the Arrest of Samuel Romerosanabria

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: FOIA Request – Records Relating to the Arrest of Samuel Romerosanabria
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting copies of all available records relating to the arrest of Samuel Romerosanabria (DOB: 04/05/1998), which took place on August 16, 2025 at approximately 5:11 PM in Dallas County, Texas.

Specifically, I request:

All body-worn camera footage and dashboard camera footage from officers involved.

Any and all 911 call recordings and dispatch logs associated with this incident.

The incident reports, arrest reports, and supplemental reports connected to this arrest.

Booking records, including mugshot and intake documentation.

The charges at the time of arrest included:

Driving While Intoxicated with Open Alcohol Container (Bond: $1,000)

Evading Arrest or Detention with a Motor Vehicle (Bond: $15,000)

Possession of Controlled Substance PG 1 < 1G (Insufficient Bond)

Unlicensed Carrying Weapon (Bond: $1,500)

Illegal Alien

This request is made to ensure full transparency and access to public records under the Texas Public Information Act.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Baxter Price
